DOC.brief_summary: Bone marrow cell previously show enhance wound heal experimental diabetes . In pilot study , patient chronic diabetic ulcer heal conventional therapy , treat local application autologous bone marrow cell .
DOC.brief_title: Local Application Autologous Bone Marrow Cells Treatment Chronic Diabetic Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus chronic nonhealing foot ulcer ( > 4weeks ) Charcot foot Nondiabetic ulcer Ulcers heal conventional therapy Sepsis Hematologic disorder Pregnancy Acute inflammatory disorder Chemotherapy
